appName: Race X: Car Racing Game | Car Games
displayName: Race X: Car Racing Game | Car Games
display_name: Race X: Car Racing Game | Car Games
display_long_description:
Race X - Ultimate VR Street Racing Experience
Get behind the wheel of high-performance sports cars and dive into the world of elite street racing. Compete against top racers, drift through the asphalt, and take on thrilling challenges to prove yourself as the ultimate street legend.

Unleash Your Speed
Race through intense street circuits, mastering sharp turns and high-speed drifts. Choose from a fleet of top-class racing cars, each customizable with powerful upgrades, vibrant paint jobs, and stylish decals.

Dominate the Streets
Experience multiple racing modes, from high-stakes PVP battles to solo career challenges. Test your driving skills with breathtaking drifts, daring stunts, and arcade-style action that keeps you on the edge of your seat.

Earn Rewards & Upgrade Your Ride
Collect coins and diamonds as you race, unlocking new cars, powerful turbo engines, and custom tuning options. Compete in leaderboards and climb the ranks to become the king of speed.

Race X Features
- Authentic street racing experience with immersive VR gameplay
- Challenge your friends in PVP mode and dominate the leaderboard
- Drive high-speed cars, each with unique handling and customization
- Master realistic drift racing and sharp turns on urban tracks
- Customize ride with decals, colors, and performance upgrades
- Compete in high-speed tournaments and win exclusive rewards

The race has already begun—strap in, hit the gas, and conquer the streets. Are you ready to become the ultimate street racing champion?
